data.text: @iambads Hey there, if you'd like to send us a DM about your experience I will happily help. Thanks again. - Emily

@ulysses35 Hi Jason. Thank you so much for this wonderful compliment! It's great to hear that our online chat team was able to help you with your booking. I will be sure to pass this feedback to our Leadership Team. Thanks - Marvin
@3rdRockSpace Hi Philip - Whenever you make a booking with Jetstar, the currency you pay for the booking in will default to the currency of the country you will be departing from. Thanks. - Emily
@hanye84 Hey Hanye, could you let us know your booking ref in a DM? I'll let our maintenance team know. - Emily

data.text: @mendrinos Hi, I'm sorry to hear you weren't happy with the way our staff handled the situation though. We do train all staff to be professional and friendly at all times so it’s disappointing if this isn’t the level of service you received. Thanks - Cheeni
@rbf_banker Hi there, so sorry to hear this. Are you able to DM us more details of your experience along with your booking reference so we can look into this further? Thanks -Kelly

Have a blessed and joyous Christmas from of all us at Jetstar! Happy holidays! https://t.co/19iwxFRGJG
@siWen_di Hi Wendi. Many of taxes are paid to government agencies and airports whether the customer travels or not. Can you please DM your booking reference so we can take a look? Thanks - Marvin
@iamvikasambwani Once you completed the feedback form, you’ll receive an acknowledgement email. Your case manager will get in touch with directly as soon as possible.
@megchits Hi there, it may help to know our Live Chat team are available 24 hrs a day and 7 days a week. :) Thanks - Cheeni
@anushka14 Hi Anushka. thanks for getting back with us. You may also get in touch with out Telephone Reservation team at these numbers https://t.co/UarlwGGJrW Thanks - Cheeni

@anushka14 Thanks for sending your query. Our website won't allow you to book a child passenger alone in one booking. On this note, I recommend for you to contact our Live Chat team here https://t.co/W7BsbAug8v to assist you in making your booking. Thanks Jan
@AideenShortt Hi Aideen. Sorry to hear this. Could you send us a DM with your booking reference so we can check further? Thanks - Marvin

data.text: @oneistoinfinity 1/2 Hi Mei. Our credit card verification is only applicable for direct flights between Manila and Singapore, and for flights departing Manila with a stopover in Singapore, passengers who purchase their booking using a credit or debit card will be required
@sarsistar Hi, I'm sorry for the experience. Please be assured that I will be including your feedback in my report to our leadership team. Thanks - Cheeni

@sarsistar 2/2  to check every piece of baggage on all of our flights. If you felt you were singled out, or staff didn’t clearly explain why you were charged to check in your baggage allowance on the day, we do apologise. Thanks - Cheeni

@sarsistar 1/2 Hi Sarsi, I'm sorry for the confusion. The 100 ml limit I mentioned would be the total for all the liquid in your carry on and not for just one bottle. We do expect our staff to be consistent in their application of the policy, however we are not able

@sarsistar Hi Sarsi, it may help to know products must be in containers of 100ml or less (broadly equivalent to 100 grams or less) and carried together in a transparent, resealable plastic bag. Please see here: https://t.co/EWg8j1M9By - Cheeni
@chris_reeves_nz Hi. I've already responded to your Tweet under Jetstar Airways. Thanks - H

data.text: @dets412 Sorry to hear this. Could you DM us your booking reference along with your correct email address so we can update it for you? Thanks- Jan
@nicholashon Hi Nicholas, thanks for your response. I'm concerned to hear this. Are you able to DM us your booking reference so we could look into this further? Thanks -Kelly

@nicholashon Hi Nicholas, so sorry to hear this. I'd recommend you to contact us directly here: https://t.co/W7BsbAug8v to add baggage allowance to your booking conveniently. For further details, you may refer here: https://t.co/4MySk1LOKm Regards -Kelly
@BENM_14 Hi Ben, I'm sorry to hear this. Could you send us more details about your booking via DM so I can assist further? Hope to hear from you soon - Kind regards, Krish
@5Seasonss Hey there, I'm sorry to hear this. Could you send us more details about your booking via DM? Hope to hear from you soon. - Kind regards, Krish
@buzzSTOCK Hi, sorry to hear about this. Can you please send your booking reference via DM so we can further look into this? Thanks -Irish
@_ramirezsam Hi Sam, can you please send us your booking reference along with the email address you provided in the booking so we can further look into this? Thanks -Irish
@ME_LON_SG Hi Sarah, can you please send your booking reference via DM so we can further look into this? Thanks -Irish
@lloydthelostboy Hey, thanks for the tag. Hope you enjoyed your flight! :) Cheers - lee
@iamvikasambwani 2/2 our Customer Care team will liaise with our Marketing guys and get a response out to you if this is something we can assist with. Thanks - Marvin

data.text: @kbarnesy Hi Kathryn, I am sorry to say that we aren't able to arrange outbound calls in the Social Media team. However, you may get in touch with our Telephone Reservations team if you wish to speak to someone. Please see https://t.co/igSODkusDl - Regards, Rona

@themanlyman Hi Courtenay, I’ve located your booking through your full name and can see that your payment was made via Travel Agent. Since you booked via a third party, its best for you to follow this matter up with them. Thanks – Irish

@lloydthelostboy Hi Lloyd, we have outlined the strict opening and closing times on your confirmation itinerary as well as on our website. We are unable to hold onto customer’s baggage outside of these times due to the facilities we use. -Irish

@91lines Hey, sorry for any confusion. If you have checked-in online and don’t have checked baggage, you can get your boarding pass at the airport and you must do this before check-in closes - https://t.co/VvjUKKteTe. Thanks - Lee

data.text: @princessdesy Hey, lounge access cannot be purchased as an add on to your ticket. Thanks - Lee
@91lines If you've already checked in online, please be at the airport 2 hours before your scheduled departure. Please see here: https://t.co/CyT0FNVBTh Thanks, Sassa

@lloydthelostboy You can check in online ffor your flight from Singapore to Okinawa between two days and up to two hours before your flight. Even if you've checked in online you must still drop your bags and be at the boarding gate on time - https://t.co/toWBHTex5M. - Lee

@princessdesy Lounge access is available for Economy Starter Max passengers departing on international flights with a JQ, 3K or QF code, where available. It is also not available for purchase. Please see here: https://t.co/EFUiLOLTRL
@shendannisaput Hi Shenandoah! Can you please DM us the booking reference? Alternatively, you can check the status of this flight here: https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL Thanks, Sassa

data.text: @pearsjojo We ask that customers involved in these cancellations do not rebook to another flight. We need you to stay on this flight so that we can move you on to the next available flight. Thanks- Jan 2/2

@pearsjojo There has been a sudden change in conditions at Bali today. As a result we've had to cancel some of our scheduled flights from Bali. I assure you this decision wasn’t taken lightly and was done in the interests of safety. 1/2

@priyankmurarka Sorry to hear this. We are currently receiving high volume of enquiries because of the current situation in Bali. Please be assured that one of my colleagues will be in touch with you shortly and we do thank you for your patience. Thanks -Kelly
